turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello. I need to order a drink from the Starbucks at 2219 North Belt Highway.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hello, how can i assist you?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: that was too fast. what do you want to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need to get a grande Iced Caffè Americano.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, would you like any milk?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure. where do you want to pick it up?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ordering from 2219 North Belt Highway, that Starbucks that's located there.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, so your order is: a grande iced americano, correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your coffee will be ready for pickup soon at the starbucks at 2219 north bell hwy.
